text: Ane komana saradaro'e javaba apyo, je'o inkara karata hatam ane akheratani mulakatane juthalavata hatam ane ame te lokone duniyana jivanamam samrd'dha banavya hatam, (te'o'e kahyum) ke a to tamara jevo ja manusya che. Tamara jevo ja khoraka a pana khaya che ane tamara piva matena panine pana te'o pive che
